Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
You had a normal and generic upbringing for your race, not specializing in anything in particular.
就你的族类而言，你资质平平，没有任何特别之处。

You enlisted as soon as possible, and quickly gained rank and honor. This is clearly not your first deployment.[br/][br/]You gain the following:[br/][AbilityGreen]Veteran:[/AbilityGreen] you start at level {LeaderLevel}, giving you {SkillPointAmount} skill points to spend after landing.[br/][AbilityGreen]Combat Experience:[/AbilityGreen] All units gain experience {CombatExpBonus} faster.

你一心从军，在军旅中如鱼得水。你绝非新手。[br/][br/]你获得如下奖励：[br/][AbilityGreen]老兵：[/AbilityGreen]你在游戏开始时为 {LeaderLevel} 级，奖励你 {SkillPointAmount} 技能点数，你可在着陆后使用。[br/][AbilityGreen]战斗经验：[/AbilityGreen]所有单位经验获取速度提升 {CombatExpBonus}。

Your natural charisma and sympathetic personality led you to a life in the diplomatic corps. What others achieve through violence, you achieve through flattery and negotiation.[br/][br/]You gain the following:[br/][AbilityGreen]Charismatic:[/AbilityGreen] you start with +{RaceRelationCha} relation with all races, excluding your own.[br/][AbilityGreen]Fast Talker:[/AbilityGreen] influence costs for bribing armies to leave sectors is reduced by {FastTalkPercen}.

你天生的魅力和共情性格，带你走上了外交使节团的职业生涯。别人以武力取胜，而你通过奉承和协商便能致胜。[br/][br/]你获得如下奖励：[br/][AbilityGreen]魅力：[/AbilityGreen]你与所有其它种族的关系提高 {RaceRelationCha}。[br/][AbilityGreen]口吐莲花：[/AbilityGreen]贿赂军队离开防区的消耗降低 {FastTalkPercen}。

You learned from very young that this is a dog-eat-dog universe, and only the strong survive. You carried this mentality throughout your military career.[br/][br/]You gain the following:[br/][AbilityGreen]Weapon Expertise:[/AbilityGreen] decreases weapon research cost by {WeaponCostDecrease}.[[br/][AbilityGreen]Ruthless Killer:[/AbilityGreen] once per turn, when your Commander kills a unit in combat, they immediately regain 1 action point.

你打小就明白这是个人吃人的宇宙，优胜劣汰，强者生存。你怀揣着这个信条度过了整个军队生涯。[br/][br/]你获得如下奖励：[br/][AbilityGreen]武器专家：[/AbilityGreen]武器研究消耗降低 {WeaponCostDecrease}。[[br/][AbilityGreen]冷血杀手：[/AbilityGreen]每回合一次，当你的指挥官在战斗中击杀单位时，立即恢复 1 点操作点数。

Trade and economic deals used to be your daily life - such are the duties of those born to wealth. When you decided to join the military, a position was easily arranged.[br/][br/]You gain the following:[br/][AbilityGreen]Economy Expertise:[/AbilityGreen] decreases Economy research cost by {EconomyCostDecrease}.[br/][AbilityGreen]Xeno Trader:[/AbilityGreen] Dwelling trading is {DwellingDiscount} cheaper (this discount can never exceed {MaxDiscountPercentage}).

处理贸易和经济事务曾是你的日常工作。这就是出身富贵者的职责。你决定参军时，军队里已经为你安排好了一个职位。[br/][br/]你获得如下奖励：[br/][AbilityGreen]经济专家：[/AbilityGreen]经济研究消耗降低{EconomyCostDecrease}。[br/][AbilityGreen]异星商人：[/AbilityGreen]居住地交易费用降低{DwellingDiscount}（此折扣不会高于{MaxDiscountPercentage}）

You spent most of your life in libraries, studying the Star Union and its rich history. It fascinates you to the core. You joined the military so you could see the Union's wonders for yourself.[br/][br/]You gain the following:[br/][AbilityGreen]Secret Technology Expertise:[/AbilityGreen] decreases Secret Technology research cost by {SecretTechCostDecrease}.[br/][AbilityGreen]Curator:[/AbilityGreen] rewards from pickups, sites and structures are increased.

你在图书馆中埋头钻研了大半辈子，研究星际联盟及其悠久的历史。你为此愿意奉献终生。你参军只是为了能亲身见证联盟的奇迹。[br/][br/]你获得如下奖励：[br/][AbilityGreen]秘密科技专家：[/AbilityGreen]秘密科技研究消耗降低 {SecretTechCostDecrease}。[br/][AbilityGreen]馆长：[/AbilityGreen]拾取物、访问点和建筑物奖励增加。

Your world is that of intrigue and intelligence, where information is the highest form of currency. The military made good use of you, or was it the other way around?[br/][br/]You gain the following:[br/][AbilityGreen]Covert Expertise:[/AbilityGreen] decreases Society Operations research cost by {CovertOpDecrease}.[br/][AbilityGreen]Covert Efficiency:[/AbilityGreen] you have {CovertStrengthAmount} Covert Strength and {CovertDefenseAmount} Covert Defense.

你的世界隐秘而伟大，信息为王。军队充分利用了你，还是说你利用了军队？[br/][br/]你获得如下奖励：[br/][AbilityGreen]隐秘学识：[/AbilityGreen]社会行动研究消耗降低 {CovertOpDecrease}。[br/][AbilityGreen]隐秘效率：[/AbilityGreen]你拥有 {CovertStrengthAmount} 隐秘力量和 {CovertDefenseAmount} 隐秘防御。
This unit gains {CombatExpBonus} more experience in battle.
该单位在战斗中获得 {CombatExpBonus} 额外经验。
Once per turn, when this unit kills another unit, it recovers 1 action point.
每回合一次，当该单位击杀其他单位时，立即恢复 1 点操作点数。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
